Package org.factcenter.qilin.protocols.generic

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PrecomputedOTBlock<E>
    Created by talm on 8/8/14.
    PrecomputedOTQueue.RequestAdditionalOTCallback
    An interface used to pass a callback object (allowing the client to request additional precomputed OTs).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlumTwoPartyGroupElementFlip<G,C,R>
    Use the Blum "coin-flip over the telephone" to randomly select a group element.
    DummyOTExtender
    A Dummy implementation of the OTExtender interface that can be used for testing.
    HomomorphicCommitmentPoK<C,P,R,Com extends NonInteractiveCommitment.Committer<C,P,R> & Homomorphic<C,P,R>,Ver extends NonInteractiveCommitment.Verifier<C,P,R> & Homomorphic<C,P,R>>
    A generic proof of knowledge that a homomorphic commitment can be opened to a known value.
    NaorPinkasOT<G>
    An implementation of the Naor-Pinkas OT protocol over a generic group in which discrete-log is hard.
    OTExtensionServer
    A Server that handles the generation of precomputed OTs.
    PrecomputedOTClient  
    PrecomputedOTQueue<E extends PrecomputedOTBlock<E>>
    Created by talm on 8/8/14.
    ProtocolPartyBase
    A default implementation of ProtocolParty.
    TrapdoorBlumTwoPartyGroupElementFlip<G,C,R>
    A trapdoor version of the BlumTwoPartyGroupElementFlip.
    TrapdoorHomomorphicCommitmentPoK<C,P,R,Com extends NonInteractiveCommitment.Committer<C,P,R> & Homomorphic<C,P,R>,Ver extends NonInteractiveCommitment.Verifier<C,P,R> & Homomorphic<C,P,R>>
    A protocol for zero-knowledge proof of knowledge of an opening for a commitment.
